name: AuthenticID
description: Verifying a user's identity documents by directing them to a unique verification URL

nodeDescription.value: Display QR Code, wait for challenge status
This node could call other flow to move forward to any process

annotation.value: Provide a verification URL to the user
When verification is complete, show an error or trigger the main flow to continue
Branch the flow based on the verification result
Wait for the user to complete verification

settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';
